description:
This module aims to introduce learners to the philosophy and principles of palliative and end-of-life care. It will equip the learners with skills needed to
provide holistic care to patients requiring palliative and end-of-life care and families.

Learners will acquire knowledge and skills on pain and symptoms management and advance care planning.
title: Practice of Palliative and End-of-Life Care
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
